content: आचरणं {@--1@} Practising, doing, performing, following, observing; धर्म°, मंगल° &c. {@--2@} Conduct, behaviour; अधीतिबोधाचरणप्रचारणैः <ls>N. 1. 4</ls> example (<ab>opp.</ab> precept); अधर्म°, दुर्° &c. {@--3@} Usage, practice. {@--4@} An institute; rite or rule of conduct. {@--5@} Approaching, arrival. {@--6@} A chariot, carriage, cart.
